transcription:
“What proud pram,” the traveler announced,
 “would hold such a moldy fruit?
 T’would give a crew scurvy
 whilst they drag through the sea”
 he sang with a strum of his lute.
 
 “The baby, it had thick cheveux noir”
 At this, the French sailors did nod,
 “But fate would reveal
 the swaddle contained
 a swarming cabin mice squad!”
 
 The crowd gasped loudly - the trade had been botched
 the feud is true, the king’s gift a fraud
 “What ye think is warm,
 would ye then scald
 and leave ye feeling watched.”
